captions.text: So you think these are better?

What do you think, which are better —
 these ones...

– You'll see everything tomorrow!
– I'm not looking!

Did they call you
Are you having a shoot?
Yes, I'm having a shoot today.
And what are you doing in the evening?

And in the evening
I'm having a hen-party.

Will you pick me up then
I want them to look at you.

– I want them to see how handsome you are!
– Of course, I will!
I can see that you're looking!

– Oh, please, stop looking at me!
– OK, OK, I won't!

Can you please check over if
there are those guys with cameras?

Oh, don't emote —there is no one there!
Moreover, we are blacked out here.

Still, could you leave in a
couple of minutes after me...

I don't want them to know
everything before the time comes.
After all, there are my fans...

But you're getting
married to me, not to them.

To some kind of the island.
A deserted island.

We could spend there at least a week.
There would be no fans, no one.

Of course, I'll drop everything now
and will go to a deserted island!

I just wanted to say that
I also sing in this show...

And I wanted to tell you
that I admire you so much!

Please, just tell me
what you want from me!

You see, everybody says
that I need a good composer.

And I thought that you
could give me an advice...
Zina. But in the show I'm Aelita.

It was the producer's idea.
And I hoped that you could...
I have a very expensive composer, Zina.

And if your producer is unable
to buy you a knobby song,
change your lover and that's all.

And I mean that. If you don't
understand that you're just stupid.

What's up Lada, honey, it's
high time for you to be here!

No, it's what's his name lsidor.
And you're after him.

Everybody, cameras are
on, hands up! Hands up!
Can I go onstage now instead of lsidor?

– What's up with you Of course you can't!
– Why not?

What do you mean? The dancers are onstage,
lsidor's track is loaded...

But it is very important for me!
I implore you!

Nothing will happen. Let
him work, and then you will.

– Please, tell them that I will go first!
– Me?

Please, please, tell
them that I will sing now!

No, I won't. 
If you want, tell them yourself.

May I go first?
And you'll sing after me, Ok?

No, not at all.  I just won't tell you wife
who I saw you
in the make-up room with. OK'?
All right! I love you, my dear!

Look, these are nice as for me...
Will they do?
Look at her! Here she goes!
Oh my God! Look at this!

Lada, how did you manage 
to take him to the marriage office?

The main thing is to prove the man
that he is serious in his intentions.
Other things are simple to accomplish.
Yeah, your fans will bewail your wedding.

Oh, girls, if you could
only imagine how tired I am!

– Don't change your last name!
– Of course, I won't!

Goldfish is one thing,
Ivan ova is an other.

– Is he lvanov?
– Yes, he is.

Oh, girls, I missed you so much!
How are you?
Asia, do you have any problems?

No, I don't. Why
Masha's life is harder.

I mean, it's hard when
you're an single mother.
I have my son and my job...

Your problem, Asia,
lies in your laziness.

You don't want at least to
try and leave your teaching!

What for I can leave
teaching and then what?
You have changed you job and now what?

You're rich, you have all those
massages and swimming pools.

It has harmed the most
of the world's population.

It's senseless. I'm fine
and I don't need anybody!

I'm quite independent.
I entered the university myself.

And I helped the workers
at the building yard to carry bricks.

And the fact that I own the company,
Asia, means that I created it myself!

– And you're complaining.
– I'm not complaining!

– You do, my dear.
– Who told you that I'm complaining?

You see, they are all
handsome, tall and married.
I would marry even an elderly man!

A foreigner. And I would go abroad.
But for my mother...

I have only one dream —
I want to marry! Like her!

You just have to know
exactly what you want.
And then you will certainly get it.

If it is meant for you, you
will have it sooner or later.

I couldn't see anything!
There are curtains on the windows.

Each of you will write about her
ideal man on a piece of paper.

Wait a second, I don't get
it! You mean, point by point?
What he is supposed to be like...

Exactly! I will take
these notes with me.

And I promise that in a year
you'll have your dreams come true.
Why in a year Why not straightaway?

Because you can't have
everything straightaway!
Do you have a piece of paper? I don't.

Are you serious? Come on.
It's clear that it is not serious...

And I will write. Give
me a piece of paper.

– What? Masha!
– Give me the paper!

– Have you grudged the paper?
– Give me the paper!

– I won't stint a piece of paper!
– What's the odds She wants to write!

I can donate a page from
my appointments book.

Here you are!
Do you need a pen, too Write!
I want to marry an artist.
Look, what is his name This one?
Well, I want to marry lsidor.
Here, I have written that — you saw it!

Where will I find him I don't
visit those bohemian parties!

It's not your concern!
Asia! Write down your wish!

I want to meet an intelligent
foreigner, who's about 45.

Nina doesn't write — she's afraid
that we'll see that she dreams of a prince.

No, a prince would be too
young for me. I need a king.

None the worse.
I want him to be my equal.
Why rich, Asia It's all apple sauce!

I want to be happy. I want to
be love, and to love myself.
Where can you find such a man?
I don't know. You have found your Vadim!
Oh, girls, Vadim is the only one!

– Write, please, don't be afraid!
– What should I write?

What if it comes true
After all, she owes you.

Who introduced Vadim
to her Come on, write!

– What would I write?
– Write: I need a king...

Write the way you said
it yourself — a king.

All right, let it be.
A king. Is that all
Oh, yes, Nina. What a nocturnal!
Well, girls, I've got to go!
I'm waiting for you tomorrow at my wedding.

Yes, it's because I'm afraid
of paparazzi and strangers.
Ok, girls, I love you! Bye!

– You'd better wear your glasses.
– No, my eyes have got tired.
I should have written "at the age of 40"...

Lada Vladimirovna,
wait a second, I'll get the car!
What car Vadim is waiting for me!
Why are you sitting here Go outside!
It can't be true...it can't be true...
Calm down, Lada, my girl, calm down!
I wanted to manage so much...
What did you want to manage?

I wanted to do so much,
I wanted to manage so much,

...In a year everything
will come true...

Nina, do you still work
with Lada's fiance, Vadim

He seems to keep up but nobody
knows how he really feels.

I can't believe that
it happened a year ago.
A year Can it be true?
Yeah... OK, thanks for a lift.

I put him in bed at
8.30 PM. He's sleeping.
Great! What did you have to eat?

Sasha didn't want to eat borsch
so I made some porridge for him.
Great! What would I do without you!

We've learned the tale
"The Buzzy Bee" by heart.
What do you mean All the lines?

No, until the place when
the mosquito comes to her.
Sorry for keeping you so long here!

– See you!
– See you tomorrow! Bye!
He's not a good match. You need lsidor.

Yeah, nobody knows what it is.
Go and ask her.

Maybe. Maybe.
Look what a cat dragged in!
Do you know what time it is?

– I'm telling her about the time...
– Oh my God!
It's five o'clock in the morning.
Yes, I'm telling her what time it is.

Albina Mikhailovna is the same.
Why don't you say anything?
Did you hear that She's a big girl now.

When you get married, you can...
But now... I don't know.

Yeah, how can I get
married with your control?

I don't even have any
place to date anyone!
And I don't have anyone to date...

– It's a nightmare.
– It's a dread.

Who did you want to meet
a year ago Did you forget it?
Well, who was that A foreigner.

Oh, God! If I could only escape
from you I'd even go abroad!
Oh, don't cry! I'll take care about it!
Oh, mom, the New Year is coming!
I know... The New Year is coming.
A Christmas Tree Artificial, of course.

Maybe the lady could tell
where this address is?

It's so far from here!
What are you doing here?

But I was told that
Pshorkin street is here...

Yes, Pshorkin street is here.
And you need Proshkin street.

The phone number is also
strange. It's not our district.

Major Proshkin street
is a suburb. It's far!
Oh, it's a pity! My teacher lives there!
OK, I'll try to get a taxi.

Mother, this is Valdek.
He saved me and the cake.
Valdek Have I said it right?
Here you are! Our beautiful girl!
We are lucky to have managed it!

He's not Valdis, he's Valdek!
Is he from Poland?
Where exactly do you live in Poland?

I heard that Krakov is
a very beautiful city!

Would you like to sit next
to my mother! Over here!
Oh, don't worry, it's for luck!
It's nothing! It could be worse!
Shall we eat or drink now?
Ladies, why are you so shy today?
Would you like some mineral water?
Oh, Valdek, what is the life like there?
Do you still have collective farms?
We farms here now! What about you?

It's Asia's piano. She has been
doing music since she was four.

I'm very sorry for my
intrusion. But I'm ready to...
Mother, everybody has heard about it!

Would you like to have another
drink? Who will join me?
Sit down. Here is a chair.
Can you pour me more champagne?

Sure! With pleasure!
Give me your wineglasses!

He's quite bold but he's
intelligent and he's a foreigner.

I found him in the street!
Does it serve your turn?
She found him in the street!
Why did you get loaded again?
You're a freak. Nobody will need you.
And where is your voice? Where is it?
My voice is within me Got it?
Look, Varvara, what are you striving for?
Do you want me to leave now?

How old are you if not
to think of your uplifts?

And who did this ble... -blefaroplastica-
mblefaroplastica surgery?
You said you uplifted your eyelids only.

You can tell this to your
housemaids You got it?

You have uplifted all
your face a hundred times!
You can't even shut your mouth!

Why are you smiling?
Why are you grinning?

Do you think I'm a child?
Do you think I'm your puppy?
I'll stand up and leave now. Got it?
Someone will be there for me.
So, what are you waiting for?
Can I have it Keep your hair on!
Excuse me. Happy New Year, Varvara!
Why did you let him in?

Let him celebrate the
holiday in a warm place!
And as it's a New Year holiday...

– What is wrong with you?
– What?
What is wrong Has my mascara spread?

– I don't know.
– The hairdo is new. Right?
No, I have noticed the hairdo.
Oh, I have got my ears pierced. You see?

Oh, and I thought you
had plucked your eyebrows!
Ok, let's have a drink yo New Year.

And I wish you that all your
wishes in the New Year...
Happy New Year! Get your present!

Couldn't you take him to the
nearest sobering-up station?
It's too far! We'd have to walk 15 minutes!

And we also want to stay in 
a warm place with some champagne!
So let this prince sleep here.

Register him quickly and
put him into the lockup.
We didn't. Traffic police officers did.

He was fighting and cursing.
And he doesn't have any documents.

OK! Let him sleep sober, we'll
take care of him tomorrow!

I've warmed and refreshed myself.
Thanks, I'll go and help him!
I don't understand you, my dear!
Don't you see whom I have brought to you?
Don't back off as Asia does.

You don't know who I am!
You just don't know me!
All of you are the common ruck.

You've not deserved to
wipe dust from my boots!
You don't even realize who I am!
Maybe I should ask for an autograph?

Where should we put
him Into the lockup?
OK, get him here. To the couch.
Well, let's go to the couch.
Shut up, Popov! Shut your mouth!

My father established it.
We work globally.

Mister Vilyanovich, we
certainly will co-operate!

Family is the symbol of
traditions and decency.
We are a vivid example of family business.

By the way, my older brother
is in charge of Belgrad office.
And I run the Moscow one.
I think that is exactly who you need.
He is the one you wanted!

Equal to you, and the most
important is that he likes you!
It's a wonderful evening, isn't it'?

– Here she is! Happy New Year!
– I've been waiting for you here!

I heard you have problems
with the Security Service.
I can help you if you want.

I'll solve my problems
myself! Thank you!

Look, I have an original offer to you —
 would you like to dance?
Maybe you'd like to go to a restaurant?

Yes, this is police...
Hello, lady, I can't hear you.

Shut up now otherwise you'll
be free in a second! Got it'?
And who will wash the floors Pushkin?

Bring the case before the
court. You will get the divorce.
What does he overwhelm you with?

Oh God, who would ever
overwhelm me with flowers?
And what flowers do you like the most?

I'm here to thank you
that you haven't left me

for the mercy of fate
on the New Year day.
It wasn't me, our guys helped you.

But you didn't let me plank
dishonorably in such an evening.

Her eyes, her kindness are
the brightest memories I have.

And I decided to...
How can I give them to you?
You see, you can't go in there.
Of course, you can! Can you hold it?
Can I talk to the lady, please?
I've come to talk to you.
I thought that you're a police officer

and you know about the
accommodation market.

You see, I have some circumstances.
I have nowhere to live.

I need an apartment and I
thought you could rent it to me.
But I don't have a spare flat.

I'll be satisfied with
a room or a corner.
Oh, is that man your husband, right?
Oh, Misha! No! He's not my husband!
I said that I had to think it over.
She's going to marry nobody knows who!
What does it mean "nobody knows who"?
Everyone in our country knows him!
He must be married! Isn't he?
Oh no, not anymore. He left his wife.
Of course! Do you think he's lying?
And what is that to you?

Oh, Masha! Doesn't
your artist juggle you?

Do you remember our wishes
we wrote on a piece of paper?

We all made our wishes —
you and I... and Asia.
Lenya, bring us some vodka, please!
I made a wish to meet a foreigner!
He is a composer from Poland.
Look, I'll call you later, OK'?
But there are three of us...

Not at all! You can make
fun of me as much as you can!
Why, have you been waiting for long?
Have you been waiting for long?
Poor thing! But it's not my fault!
What time is it at your watch?
Asia, this is like a kinder orchard!
Right! You behave like a little girl!
Why do I have to apologize all the time?
Oh, Valdek, don't be offended, please!

I had an extra class with my children,
and after that a prosody coterie.

Good ones! About nature,
about weather, about love!
"I will weave the pattern of my road,

Oh God, I can feel no distance any more,
My towns disappear,
My desire is a shadow of silk,
I can rent the sky and say good bye to all,
We have to go to you home. Now.
Wait a bit, I can't, it's too fast!
You will have to fit me.
Why do I have to fit you?
"I will weave the pattern of my road"

"I will weave the pattern of
my road". Why do you need it?

Valdek, Valdek!
Why didn't you come earlier?
This is what I've been looking for.
It's OK, they will make it out!
"I will weave the pattern of my road,
Oh God, I can feel no distance any more,
My desire is a shadow of silk,

I can rent the sky and
say good bye to all,
I have always admired your punctuality.

Your invitation was unexpected.
Why did you invite me?

Isn't it possible for us to meet
and spend some time together?
Of course, it is but... I thought that...
I have an offer to you.
We are people of business, Miss Pavlova.

Our marriage and the
merger of our companies

will leave no possibilities
for our competitors.
And what do you think, I don't have?
We'll have absolute power and priority

at the real estate
market in your country.
This is a good speech for the press.
Do you want me to make it simpler?

But it's not a good reason 
to decline my offer.
Unions of hearts are made in heaven,

and marriages of convenience
are made at the notary's offices.
Then I will be more specific.
I won't give him to you, got it?

I don't know what I'll do,
but you won't be with him!
I'm sure that you will be able
But it's a very expensive present.

I'm not that meticulous.
Let it be a little souvenir.

And I beg you to keep
it as we are partners.

Well, only if this is a
present from a business partner.
I have another offer to you.
Why don't you buy it yourself?

Police! Don't move or I'll
shoot! Get into the car, quickly!
They are my fans! Are you a fool?
Oh, wait, I didn't mean to say that!
Masha, you see, people don't dangle a gun
before my eyes every day! I was scared!

Really? I must have 
got the wrong impression.

And these fans could tread
you and your guards to pieces!

Tell me, please, why do you
always go out the service entrance?
And how should I go out?
How In some other way. As all people do.
They come and go through the front door!
Is there any problem with my clothes?

And use some make up, disguise
yourself with false mustaches
and a hat... I don't know.

Oh, come on. 
You wear a uniform all the time!
I have just finished my work.
I didn't have anytime to change.
Really? Why didn't you say anything?

Happy birthday to
You! Happy birthday
Hey, drive us to my favorite!
Look, Masha, I've got an idea!
What do you think about working for me?

Why a dresser? Don't offend me!
You can be a security officer!
Why, it's funny — a chick is my bodyguard!

Yes, right... And when
will I bring up my son?

Is that a big deal?
There are plenty of nannies!
Hello. Did I wake you up?
Oh, no, don't worry! I'm driving.

I was thinking that
maybe I could come to you.
In ten minutes I will be at home.
I want to get drunk but I can't.

Maybe it's time to recall
that you're still alive?
What did you say about some plots?
Yes, there is a plot, a good plot.
I'm planning to build three houses there.
Why doesn't he build there himself?
Who Oh, he's getting married. To a model.
And it looks as if he is going abroad.

It's a strange story.
And it's a strange gift.

You should check him up.
I can do it if you want.
No, don't. I'll take care of it myself.

Just don't get offended,
OK'? This is my business.
You may stay if you want.
I'll make a bed here for you.
Why does it hurt so much, mummy?
Why does it hurt that much'?
I hate my alive and happy girlfriends!

Nothing depends on me!
I can see it , nothing depends on me!
I want to leave. I want to leave.
Hurry, hurry, operating group is coming!
Masha, why are you so nervous?
I'm waiting for in the yard.
Hi, my baby, how are you?

I'll be at work soon.
I'll get there myself, OK'?
Let me button up your coat.
Misha, didn't you get enough sleep?
Did you hear me Show me your ID!

Misha, what are you talking about?
Are you my mother or my father?

The son who learned a poem
for you for half a night.

He can bloody well
congratulate her tomorrow!
It was a great roundhouse punch!
I think it was a knockdown.

OK, let's go or you'll be
late for the kindergarten.
A knockdown is not a knockout.
I was here all the time!
Open the door! I would bump you!
What plans do you have for today?
Can you pass me my purse, please?
Don't! I can do it myself.
Give it to me! Give it back to me!

– What is it?
– Give it to me!

It's a souvenir. A souvenir
from Vilyanovich. Give it up!
He proposed to me and I refused.
But you have pocketed the ring.
I'm a grown-up and independent woman.

Can I make these decisions
about taking presents myself?

You must have confused
me with someone else. No?
Who have I confused you with?

You called me Goldfish today.
And I'm not a Goldfish.

Mister Valdek, here are some
chicken cutlets, salad and bread.
Are you going to be hungry on the train?

— And mister Valdek will want to eat!Right?
— In that case there is a dining-car!
Just listen what she is talking about!

This is her feature —
 she likes spending money.

Blowing them off,
especially somebody else's.
And eat hot meals three times a day!

Sit down before you leave,
Asia, it is necessary!

Mummy, let's go or we'll be
late, the taxi is waiting!

I'm not going to the
station. Go yourself, ok?
The shorter the parting, the less tears.

Mister Valdek, I beg you
not to delay having a baby!

– We're not that young. You understand me!
– Mother, please!

Mister Valdek understands me,
we are not that young!

Haven't you left anything behind?
Passport and tickets?

Your bag Wait a second,
don't cross the door!

– I'll give it to you!
– Go, go! OK. bye-bye!

Valdek, take care of her!
She's such a delicate girl!

– Why are you crying?
– I don't know!

Come on, you're getting
married! You must be happy!
Oh God, I don't know what to say!
Everything is gonna be all right!

Haven't you forgotten the documents?
You're so absent-minded!
What's wrong? Did I offend you?
No, I'm not offended, I just...

– Does it have to do with your mom?
– She has nothing to do with it!

I've done a new deal.
I've bought a plot.
I've got a loan from the bank.

And I'm building two
16-storeyed buildings there.

I told you! I told you
not to call me anymore!

Really, I just don't
want to listen about it!

Vadim, Vilyanovich has
nothing to do with it all.
Why are you staring at me?
Everything is perfect! Get in the car!

I hope that you have
received a good commission
for having set up your main competitor?

Confess that it were
you who persuaded Nina
to buy a plot from some Mashkovich!

It was a square deal,
I just introduced them.

But you know it perfectly well
that Mashkovich is a bankrupt.

Two months ago all his
property was arrested.

But I really didn't know
that it was invalid!

You must have forgotten that
all telephone conversations

"Hold back the information
about the court decision
at least for the couple of weeks.

If you manage 
to prolong this period — I pay double."
This is a falsification and a blackmailing.
You'll tell the court about it.

Asia! I thought that you
are the most sensible of us.
I'm as stupid as you are.

The plot, you bought, had been arrested
to pay the debts of the previous owner.

– The building has been stopped.
– How could it happen?

– Can you hear me, Nina Vitalyevna?
– Calm down, Rita.

– What shall we do?
– Rita, calm down!

– What shall I do, Nina Vasilyevna?
– No panic!

– OK, I'm calm.
– That's a good girl. Now, listen to me.

Go and tell the staff
that today is a short-time.
What is the date? I don't know.

Stockbreeder's day Let them
go to their country houses!
Well, Rita, we'll be in touch.
I just have a problem. A big one.

My wonderful fiance Vilyanovich
decided to play revenge.

All right, I'll go and get
a towing rope from my boot?
That would be the last straw.

– We'll sort it out!
– Where is she going?
You're mine! Do you hear me?
Why is it so cold here?
Yes, this is me. Who is this?
I was asked to call you.
Nina Vitalyevna met with an accident.
Not very long ago. It's very serious.
"I will weave the pattern of my road,
Oh God, I can feel no distance any more,
My desire is a shadow of silk,

I can rent the sky and
say good bye to all,
Your lsidor will rather escape from you.

– What shall I do What shall I do?
– Hold her tight!

– I'm holding!
– Hold her well, don't joggle!

Vadim, she's bleeding,
Vadim, I'm afraid of blood!

– Get off my way?
– Just hold her hard!
Don't leave me now, I beg you!
Don't leave, I love you, such a fool!

Nina, don't leave me
now, I beg you! Nina!

Nina, breathe!
Nina, don't leave me, Nina!
Oh, don't worry, you have a girl!

Congratulations! A girl is
not a boy, of course, but...
Hey, Misha, where are you going?

– There!
– Why are you going there?
And what do you want there?

– And why are you going there?
– I just wanted to see.
There is nothing to look at?
But why did they go there?

– OK, go and see!
– I won't go anywhere now!
What did you want to see there?

title: Год Золотой Рыбки / The Year of the Golden Fish. Фильм. StarMedia. Мистическая Мелодрама. 2007
